# sopel-tableflip
sopel-tableflip is a simple tableflip bot for Sopel.

This bot will flip a table when requested.
(╯°□°)╯︵ ┻━┻ ︵ ╯(°□° ╯)

## Usage
```
# Get all the tableflip commands
.@?
``

## Requirements
```
requests
sopel
```
